org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.mmtf

Class MmtfUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.nbio.structure.io.mmtf.MmtfUtils

  • public class MmtfUtils
extends Object
    A utils class of functions needed for Biojava to read and write to mmtf.
    Author:
    Anthony Bradley

      • fixMicroheterogenity

        public static void fixMicroheterogenity(Structure bioJavaStruct)
        This sets all microheterogeneous groups (previously alternate location groups) as separate groups. This is required because mmtf groups cannot have multiple HET codes.
        Parameters:
        bioJavaStruct -

                                                  Map<String,Integer> chainIdToIndexMap)
        Convert a bioassembly information into a map of transform, chainindices it relates to.
        Parameters:
        bioassemblyInfo - the bioassembly info object for this structure
        chainIdToIndexMap - the map of chain ids to the index that chain corresponds to.
        Returns:
        the bioassembly information (as primitive types).

        Returns:
        the double array (16 long).
